entry.title: Vollrath 47713 - 3/8" French Fry Potato Cutter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Food Prep Tools
Price: 312.00

The Vollrath 47713 is a potato cutter with 3/8" slots for cutting potatoes into a French fry shape. The body is constructed of durable cast iron and nickel plating, and it has four legs that can be screwed into a table or wall.

If fries are a staple of your menu, this potato cutter should be a staple of your kitchen. The height opening of the cutter is 6.38 inches and fits a variety of different potato sizes. The lever is long and easy to press-down, which makes preparing any sized batch of fries a lot easier than doing it by hand.

      • Durable, cast iron construction
      • 3/8" fry width
      • 6.38" opening for potatoes
      • Manually operated with a lever

SPECS

Model 47713
Brand Vollrath
Fry Size 3/8"
Opening for Potatoes 6.38"

entry.title: Vollrath - 7 Qt. Retro Stock Pot Kettle Rethermalizer - 120v, 1450w
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Soup Kettle
Price: 742.00

The Vollrath retro stock pot rethermalizer is for soups, stews, sauces, and other liquid foodstuffs. As a rethermalizer, it's different from a regular soup kettle warmer in that its designed to take frozen or chilled food to a serving temperature. A warmer is meant to keep hot food hot. Though not all rethermalizers function as warmers, this retro stock pot does.

This rethermalizer is designed to take a container of cooked food from a chilled state through the HACCP "danger zone" to above 165° F (73.9° C) in less than 90 minutes. The temperature will be maintained above 150° F (65.6° C) when the food product and inset are used with a cover, and the food product is stirred regularly. It ships complete with a hinged cover, soup cards, and a card holder.

      • Heating system is in direct contact with water for efficient heating
      • Capillary tube thermostat control
      • Front access dials for easy temperature setting
      • Wide dripless lip for catching and draining moisture back into the well
      • Heavy-duty, powder-coated, aluminum exterior that's cool-to-the-touch
      • Non-skid feet
      • Spot welded handles
      • NSF approved

SPECS

Model 7217210, 7217235, 7217250, 7217255, 7217260
Dimensions (Dia, H) 16.5" x 13.5"
Capacity 7qt
Electrical 120v / 12a / 1450w
Plug NEMA 5-15P

SHIPPING

This is a special order item. The delivery time is around two weeks.

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Vollrath JT4 - Commercial Dual Conveyor Toaster - 1100 slices per hour
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Toaster
Price: 3067.00

Vollrath's JT4 dual conveyor toaster has two independently-controlled toasting chambers. This toaster provides the flexibility of two toasters in the footprint of one, so it is ideal for mid-size restaurants that need to toast different bread products at the same time, but it is not intended for high-volume toasting operations. 

The JT4 is built in the USA using high-quality stainless steel and aluminized steel. It has an independent variable speed control for each chamber, as well as independent top and bottom heat controls. The conveyors measure 14.5" wide which, along with forced convection and fast-reacting quartz heaters, provide improved toasting results. 

The high-temperature bearings and thermoplastic terminal blocks, high-quality, insulated wires, and maintenance-free drive system are all designed specially to allow ease of service, less required maintenance, and a long performance life. If you're looking for a similar model, but one that can also be converted to a pass-through model, check out the Vollrath JT4HC. 

      • Two toasters in the footprint of one
      • Independent top and bottom heat controls, speed control, and standby mode
      • Extremely versatile: best used when two different breads are required at the same time
      • Designed for medium-volume locations

SPECS

Model JT4
Item No. CT4-208DUAL, CT4-220Dual, CT4-240Dual
Dimensions (WDH) 20.25" x 28.75" x 23.5"
Slices per hour (up to) 1,100
Product Opening (top chamber) 1.5" - 3'
Product Opening (bottom chamber) closed - 1.5"
Voltage 208
Watts 4900
Amps 23.6
Hz 60
Plug NEMA 6-30P
Weight 75 lb

WARRANTY

Two year parts and one year labour warranty. For heater tubes, the warranty period is one year parts and labour. Heater tube glass damage is not covered.

entry.title: Vollrath HS-7 - 7 Qt. Round Rethermalizer - 120v, 800w
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Soup Kettle
Price: 307.00 - 387.00 (2 variants)

The Vollrath Cayenne HS-7 "heat n' serve" is a rethermalizer for soups, stews, sauces, and other liquid foodstuffs. As a rethermalizer, it's somewhat different from a regular soup kettle warmer in that its designed to take frozen or chilled food to a serving temperature. A warmer is meant to keep hot food hot. Though not all rethermalizers function as warmers, Vollrath's "heat n' serve" line does once the food is reheated. If you're wanting this functionality, be sure to purchase the option that includes a fitted inset!

The HS-7 is designed to take a container of cooked food from a chilled state through the HACCP "danger zone" to above 165° F (73.9° C) in less than 90 minutes. The temperature will be maintained above 150° F (65.6° C) when the food product and inset are used with a cover, and the food product is stirred regularly. The heating element has a nonstick coating to prevent things like scale build-up, which ultimately extends the life of the machine. 

It has recessed controls that prevent accidental adjustments, a low-water light to keep you from having to do guesswork, and non-skid feet to maintain stability and prevent movement.

      • Made in the USA
      • Safely reheat soup, stew, chili, marinades, and much more
      • 7 qt. capacity
      • Bottom-exiting, 6-foot cord
      • Thermostatic controls
      • Durable well constructed of self-insulating resin

    SPECS

    Model HS-7
    Item 72017, 72018 (with inset)
    Dimensions (Diameter x H) 11" x 10"
    Electrical 120v / 6.7a / 800w
    Plug NEMA 5-15P

    SHIPPING

    This is a special order item. The delivery time is around two weeks.

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labour warranty.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Vollrath JT2 - Commercial Conveyor Toaster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Toaster
Price: 1442.00 - 1525.00 (6 variants)

The Vollrath JT2 and JT2H are toasters that feature easy-to-use conveyor controls and can toast anywhere from 300 to 800 slices per hour. In this series, there are two main options you get to choose from: the voltage, and the product opening height.

You can choose from 120v, 208v, or 240v, with the higher the voltage, the more output you have. And you can choose between two different product opening sizes: the JT2 has a 1.5" product opening, which is perfect for standard bread. And the JT2H has an adjustable 1.5"-3" product opening, which is perfect for standard breads, specialty breads, buns, and bagels.

These machines are intended for medium-volume applications. If you're looking for a model that has a one-sided toasting option and has a slighter higher output, check out Vollrath's JT2B series.

      • Variable top and bottom heat controls, in addition to speed controls
      • 2-slice, 10.5" wide conveyor belt
      • For mid-size volume operations
      • NSF approved, cULus listed
      • Made in the USA

SPECS

Item # Model Description
CT4-120450 JT2 450 Slices Per Hour, 120v
CT4-208800 JT2 800 Slices Per Hour, 208v
CT4-240800 JT2 800 Slices Per Hour, 240v
CT4H-120300 JT2H 300 Slices Per Hour, 120v, High Clearance
CT4H-208550 JT2H 550 Slices Per Hour, 208v, High Clearance
CT4H-240550 JT2H 550 Slices Per Hour, 240v, High Clearance


WARRANTY

Two year parts parts and one year labour warranty. The heater tubes have a one year parts and labour warranty, and the heater tube glass damage is not covered.

entry.title: Vollrath JB3H - Electric Countertop Conveyor Oven - 14.5" wide belt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Conveyor Oven
Price: 2472.00

Vollrath's JB3H conveyor sandwich oven has individual top and bottom heat control and adjustable conveyor speed for toasting sandwiches and bread, and melting cheese. This unit is ideal for low-volume sandwich shops and small restaurants. They are not intended to cook raw food or toppings, nor for continuous use. 

Made in the USA for quality and longevity, the JB3H is constructed of stainless and aluminized steel, has a maintenance-free drive system, adjustable product opening, forced convection, and ventless operation. It has been UL tested and verified, and has NSF certification.

entry.title: Vollrath JPO18 - Ventless Electric Countertop Conveyor Oven - 18" Wide Belt, 26" Chamber
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Conveyor Oven
Price: 5193.00

Vollrath's JPO18 is a series of electric conveyor ovens with 18" wide belts and 26" long cooking chambers. They bake fresh dough and par-baked pizza, flat breads, and garlic or cheese bread, and offer flexibility and convenience for operations that offer pizza in addition to other menu items. Top and bottom heat control and adjustable conveyor speed allow operators to dial in ideal settings for different types of crust and toppings. 

Made in the USA for performance and durability, these units are constructed of stainless steel and aluminized steel, are UL tested and verified for ventless operation. They sit on adjustable legs and have a 6ft cord with plug.

These ovens are intended to bake one pizza at a time. They are not suited for pizzerias that require continuous-use, high-capacity baking. They are not intended to cook raw food or toppings, frozen or deep dish pizza. 

      • Made in the USA
      • Stainless and aluminized steel construction
      • UL and NDF certified

      • Conveyor direction options
      • Ventless operation
      • Variable speed control
      • Thermostatic independent top and bottom heat controls
      • Forced convection
      • Stackable

      • Adjustable product opening
      • Adjustable legs
      • 6ft cord with plug

Price: 3151.00

Vollrath's JT3HC series are commercial conveyor toasters that quickly and easily convert from standard toaster to pass-through, offering the benefits of two units in the footprint of one. They provide the flexibility for medium-volume restaurants to toast bread and bagels as well as toast sandwiches and melt cheese in one unit.

Made in the USA, these units feature high quality materials and construction, with adjustable product openings and legs, heavy-duty drive chains, maintenance-free drive systems, and high-temperature bearings. Independent speed and heat controls and Standby Mode for each chamber for added versatility and energy efficiency.

The Vollrath JT2000 is a commercial conveyor toaster with an extremely high output. It's perfect for institutions, military, and commissaries. It has a fast, short-duration feeding system.

It has a 1.75" product opening height, which is designed for standard bread, buns, and bagels. It has a one-sided toasting option which is good for bagels and buns. It can produce up to 2000 slices an hour. If you want a similar model, but with slightly less output, you can check out the Vollrath JT3BH.

entry.title: Vollrath JT1B - Commercial Conveyor Toaster with One-Sided Bagel Toasting Option
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Toaster
Price: 1033.00 - 1134.00 (2 variants)

The Vollrath JT1B and JT1BH are 120v toasters that feature easy-to-use conveyor controls to toast 400-500 slices per hour. There are two toasters in the "JT1B" series: the JT1B and the JT1BH. The primary difference is the product opening height. The JT1B has a 1.2" opening and the JT1H has an opening that is adjustable from 1" - 3". Both machines can toast bread, bagels, and buns, but the JT1BH can also do larger specialty breads.

Also, the JT1B has an output of up to 500 slices per hour, whereas the JT1BH has an output of 400 slicers per hour. These machines are intended for medium-volume and self-serve applications, who would like a one-sided toasting option for buns or bagels. If you don't need the one-sided toasting option, and are fine with a slightly lower output, you can also check out the Vollrath JT1 series. Or if you want the one-sided toasting option, but more output, check out the JT2B and the JT3BH.

      • Speed control only
      • One sided toasting option — toggle between full heat and one-sided top-heat toasting only for bagels or buns
      • 2-slice, 10.5" wide conveyor belt
      • For low- or mid-volume and self-serve application or when replacing popup toasters
      • NSF approved, cULus listed
      • Made in the USA

    SPECS

entry.title: Vollrath VP16 - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine with ACS and USB - Two 16" Seal Bars

Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 9740.00

Vollrath's VP16 vacuum packaging machine is designed for easy use and cleaning, high performance, and durability. This large unit has a smooth, stainless steel exterior and a transparent, soft-open lid.

This model is very similar to the Vollrath 40833, but with some added features: password-controlled access, HACCP logging, and label printing provide added safety and convenience. A helpful liquid-control feature ensures high-quality packaging, and optional programs like soft-air, tenderize, marinate and more allow you to use this vacuum sealer for a variety of foods.

entry.title: Vollrath HS-11 - 11 Qt. Round Rethermalizer - 120v, 800w
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Soup Kettle
Price: 340.00 - 455.00 (2 variants)

The Vollrath Cayenne HS-11 "heat n' serve" is a rethermalizer for soups, stews, sauces, and other liquid foodstuffs. As a rethermalizer, it's somewhat different from a regular soup kettle warmer in that its designed to take frozen or chilled food to a serving temperature. A warmer is meant to keep hot food hot. Though not all rethermalizers function as warmers, Vollrath's "heat n' serve" line does once the food is reheated. If you're wanting this functionality, be sure to purchase the option that includes a fitted inset!

The Vollrath HS-11 is designed to take a container of cooked food from a chilled state through the HACCP "danger zone" to above 165° F (73.9° C) in less than 90 minutes. The temperature will be maintained above 150° F (65.6° C) when the food product and inset are used with a cover, and the food product is stirred regularly.

      • Made in the USA
      • NSF Approved, cULus listed
      • Safely rethermalizes soup, stew, chili, sauces and more
      • Durable well is made of thermoset fiber-reinforced self-insulating resin for maximum energy efficiency
      • Thermostatic controls ensure accurate heating
      • Bottom-exit 6-foot cord and plug provide flexibility in countertop placement
      • Uses up to 25 percent less energy, saving you money
      • 7-quart model also available

SPECS

Model HS-11
Item Number 72009, 72021
Dimensions (Diameter x H) 12.6" x 9.6"
Well Depth 6.75"
Voltage 120
Watts 800
Amps 6.7
Plug NEMA 5-15P

SHIPPING

This is a special order item. The delivery time is around two weeks.

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

entry.title: Vollrath MWA7025 - 1000w Medium Duty Commercial Microwave - .9 Cu. Ft.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Commercial Microwave
Price: 511.00 - 606.00 (2 variants)

Vollrath has two models available for their medium duty microwaves. The first is the MWA7025 (touch controls), and the second is the MWA7125 (with digital controls). There are some differences between each model, so be sure to read below for more details.

Both of these microwaves come with 1000w of power, which means they're more suitable for smaller kitchens that don't require high volume cooking. They're built compact with stainless steel exteriors and interiors, and the interior plate is built of ceramic. 

      • Stainless steel exterior and interior
      • Quickly and easily heat a variety of foods
      • Digital or manual controls
      • Compact design
      • 0.9 cu. ft. capacity
      • 1000w output

FEATURES

 

MWA7025

  • Three power levels
  • 20 programmable settings
  • Digital display and timer
  • Stainless steel exterior and interior
  • Interior ceramic bottom plate
  • .9 cubic feet cooking chamber
  • 3 ft. (.9 meter) cord with plug
  • 1000 watt output

MWA7125

  • Six power levels
  • 60 minute timer
  • Digital display window shows power level, time and program
  • Stainless steel exterior and interior
  • Interior ceramic bottom plate
  • .9 cubic feet cooking chamber
  • 3 ft. (.9 meter) cord with plug

entry.title: Vollrath CM-24 - Food Rethermalizer with Two Insets - 1100w
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Food Warmer
Price: 676.00 - 691.00 (2 variants)

The Vollrath CM-24 is a food rethermalizer with two circular insets meant to rethermalize two different foods at the same time. Each well has separate controls. 

The Cayenne twin well rethermalizer is designed to take pre-cooked food from the danger zone of 4.4°C to 73.9°C in less than 90 minutes. The temperature will then be maintained at 65.6°C when an inset or pan are used with a standard pan or inset cover, the proper water level in the well is maintained, and the food is stirred regularly. With the proper inset and lid, this machine could be placed front of house to act as a warmer once the food is reheated.

      • Aluminum-coated wells
      • Separate temperature controls for each well
      • Capillary tube thermostat control for power efficiency
      • Concentrates heat inside the well for user safety
      • Non-skid feet
      • With the proper inset and lid, this machine could be placed front of house to act as a warmer once the food is reheated
      • Made in America

SPECS

Model CM-24
Item 72045, 72040
Dimensions (WDH) 17.25" x 9.25" x 8.75"
Capacity 8 qt
Well Depth 6.38"
Electrical 120v / 9.2a / 550w
